title: History of the Bicycle
description: Bicycles are popular all around the world, but did you know the bicycle has been around for almost two hundred years? History of the Bicycle discusses how this machine has changed over time. Students will also learn how the technology is continuously improving and get a glimpse into what the future may hold for this popular form of transportation, leisure, and sport.
highFrequencyWords: bicycles, design, frame, gear, invention, iron, materials, pedals, rods
